GV06apsulb_u:4: pṛṣṭhyāntayorantau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimitaṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_1.2c //
GV06apsulb_u:9: dīrghasyākṣṇayārajjuḥ pārśvamānī tiryaṅmānī ca yat pṛthagbhute kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_1.4a //
GV06apsulb_u:13: pramāṇaṃ tṛtīyena vardhayet tac caturthenātmacatustriṃśonena saviśeṣaḥ // ĀpŚus_1.6 //
GV06apsulb_u:15: pramāṇamātrīṃ rajjum ubhayataḥ pāśāṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_1.7b //
GV06apsulb_u:16_0: madhye lakṣaṇam ardhamadhyamayoś ca pṛṣṭhyāyāṃ rajjum āyamya pāśayorlakṣaṇeṣviti
GV06apsulb_u:16_1: śaṅkūn nihaty upāntyayoḥ pāśau pratimucya madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nimittaṃ karoti /
GV06apsulb_u:18: uparyupari nimittaṃ madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṃsam āyacchet /
GV06apsulb_u:19: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya madhyamenaiva lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet /
GV06apsulb_u:22: pṛṣṭhyāntayor madhye ca śaṅkūn nihatyārdhe 'rdhe tadviśeṣam abhyasya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvārdhamagamayet /
GV06apsulb_u:23: antyayoḥ pāśau kṛtvā madhyame saviśeṣaṃ pratimucya pūrvasminn itaraṃ lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṅkam āyacchet /
GV06apsulb_u:24: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya lakṣaṇenaiva dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet /
GV06apsulb_u:26: pramāṇaṃ tiryag dvikaraṇy āyāmas tasyākṣṇayārajjus trikaraṇī // ĀpŚus_2.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:34: caturaśrāc caturaśraṃ nirjihīrṣan yāvan nirjihīrṣet tasya karaṇyā varṣīyaso vṛddhramullikhet // ĀpŚus_2.5a //
GV06apsulb_u:35: vṛrdhasya pārśvamānīm akṣṇayetarat pārśvam upasaṃharet // ĀpŚus_2.5b //
GV06apsulb_u:36: sā yatra nipatet tad apacchindyāt // ĀpŚus_2.5c //
GV06apsulb_u:38: upasaṃhṛtākṣaṇayārajjuḥ sā catuṣkaraṇī chinnā cetarā ca yat pṛthagbhūte kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_2.6a //
GV06apsulb_u:41: dīrghacaturaśraṃ samacaturaśraṃ cikīrṣan tiryaṅmānyāpacchidya śeṣaṃ vibhajyobhayata upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_2.7a //
GV06apsulb_u:44: samacaturaśraṃ dīrghacaturaśraṃ cukīrṣanā yāvaccikīrṣet tāvatīṃ pārśvamānīṃ kṛtvā yadadhikaṃ syād yathāyogam upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_3.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:45: caturaśraṃ maṇḍalaṃ cikīrṣan madhyāt koṭyāṃ nipātayet // ĀpŚus_3.2a //
GV06apsulb_u:46: pārśvataḥ parikṛṣyātiśayatṛtīyena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet // ĀpŚus_3.2b //
GV06apsulb_u:49: maṇḍalaṃ caturaśraṃ cikīrṣan viṣkambhaṃ pañcadaśa bhāgān kṛtvā dvāv uddharet /
GV06apsulb_u:56: yāvatpramāṇā rajjus tāvatastāvato vargān karoti // ĀpŚus_3.8a //
GV06apsulb_u:60: yac ca tena caturaśraṃ kriyate tat koṭyām // ĀpŚus_3.9b //
GV06apsulb_u:64: āgnyādheyike vihāre gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarāle vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_4.1a //
GV06apsulb_u:68: caturviṃśatyām aparimite yāvatā vā cakṣuṣā manyate tasmān nātidūram ādheya iti sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa śrūyate // ĀpŚus_4.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:69: dakṣiṇataḥ purastād vitṛtīyadeśe gārhapatyasya nedīyasi dakṣiṇāgner vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_4.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:70_0: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarālaṃ pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā vā saṃvibhajya ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ vā
GV06apsulb_u:70_1: bhāgam āgantum upasamasya samaṃ traidhaṃ vibhajyāparasmiṃs tṛtīye lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā
GV06apsulb_u:70_2: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti tad
GV06apsulb_u:72: yajamānamātrī prācy aparimitā vā yathāsannāni havīṃṣi saṃbhaved evaṃ tiraścī prāñcau vedyaṃsāv unnayati /
GV06apsulb_u:73: pratīcī śroṇī purastād aṃhīyasī paścāt prathīyasī madhye saṃnatataraivam iva hi yoṣeti dārśikyā veder vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_4.5 //
GV06apsulb_u:74_0: apareṇāhavanīyaṃ yajamānamātrī dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya tāvatīṃ rajjum āyamya madhye
GV06apsulb_u:74_1: lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇayoḥ śroṇyaṃsayor antarā niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti /
GV06apsulb_u:78: tiryaṅmānīṃ dviguṇāṃ tathā kṛtvā paścāt purastāc copalikhet /
GV06apsulb_u:81: triṃśat padāni prakramā vā paścāttiraśvī bhavati /
GV06apsulb_u:82: ṣaṭtriṃśat prācī caturviṃśatiḥ purastāt tiraścīti saumikyā veder vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_5.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:83_0: ṣaṭtriṃśikāyām aṣṭādaśopasamasya aparasmād antād dvādaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ pañcadaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ
GV06apsulb_u:83_1: pṛṣṭhyāntayor antau niyamya pañcadaśakena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nihantyevam uttarataḥśroṇī /
GV06apsulb_u:98: dakṣiṇasmād aṃsād dvādaśasu dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyāṃ nipātayet /
GV06apsulb_u:102: saumikyā veditṛtīyadeśe yajeteti sautrāmaṇyā veder vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_5.8a //
GV06apsulb_u:103: prakramāsya dvikaraṇī prakramasthānīyā bhavati trikaraṇyā vā // ĀpŚus_5.8b //
GV06apsulb_u:106: trīṇi caturviṃśāni padaśatāni sautrāmaṇikī vediḥ // ĀpŚus_5.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:107: dvistāvā vedir bhavatīty aśvamedhe vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_5.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:112: eṣa hi ceṣṭānāṃ kartā bhavati // ĀpŚus_6.2b //
GV06apsulb_u:113: rathamātrī nirūḍhapaśubandhasya vedir bhavatīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_6.3a //
GV06apsulb_u:114: tasya khalvāhū rathākṣamātrī paścāt tiryag īṣayā prācī /
GV06apsulb_u:121: ṣaḍaśītiyugaṃ cāsya rathaścāraṇa ucyate iti rathaparimāṇam // ĀpŚus_6.5b //
GV06apsulb_u:122: aratnibhir vā caturbhiḥ paścāt ṣaḍbhiḥ prācī tribhiḥ purastāt /
GV06apsulb_u:123: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamya dvābhyām adhyardheneti śroṇyaṃsān nirharet // ĀpŚus_6.6 //
GV06apsulb_u:124: yajamānamātrī catuḥsraktir bhavatīti paitṛkyā veder vijñāyate,
GV06apsulb_u:125: tadekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet // ĀpŚus_6.7 //
GV06apsulb_u:127: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet // ĀpŚus_6.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:128: tāṃ yugena yajamānasya vā padair vimāya śamyayā parimimīte // ĀpŚus_6.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:129: pade yuge 'ratnāv iyati śamyāyāṃ ca mānārtheṣu yathākāmī śabdārthasya viśayitvāt // ĀpŚus_6.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:132: navāratni tiryak saptaviṃśatir udag āyatam iti sadaso vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_7.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:136: aratnimātraṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya sraktiṣu śaṅkūn nihatyārdhaprādeśena taṃ taṃ parilikhec chrutisāmarthyāt // ĀpŚus_7.4 //
GV06apsulb_u:140: karaṇaṃ vyāyāmasya tṛtīyāyāmaṃ saptamavyāsaṃ kārayet // ĀpŚus_7.7 //
GV06apsulb_u:143: maṇḍalāyāṃ mṛdo dehaṃ kṛtvā madhye śaṅkuṃ nihatyārdhavyāyāmena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet // ĀpŚus_7.10a //
GV06apsulb_u:144: tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvat sambhavet tan navadhā vyavalikhya traidham ekaikaṃ pradhikaṃ vibhajet // ĀpŚus_7.10b //
GV06apsulb_u:145: upadhāne caturaśrasyāvāntaradeśān prati sraktīḥ sampādayet // ĀpŚus_7.11a //
GV06apsulb_u:147: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_7.11c //
GV06apsulb_u:152: yathāsaṅkhyam itarā vyavalikhya yathāyogam upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_7.15 //
GV06apsulb_u:153: bhavatīva khalu vā eṣa yo 'gniṃ cinute iti vijñāyate /
GV06apsulb_u:154: vayasāṃ vā eṣa pratimayā cīyata ityākṛticodanāt /
GV06apsulb_u:156: yāvadāmnānena veṇunā caturaśre ātmani puruṣān avamimote // ĀpŚus_8.2a //
GV06apsulb_u:157: puruṣaṃ dakṣiṇe pakṣe puruṣaṃ pucche puruṣam uttare // ĀpŚus_8.2b //
GV06apsulb_u:161: ekavidhaḥ prathamo 'gnir dvividho dvitīyas trividhas tṛtīyaḥ ta evam evodyantyaikaśatavidhāt // ĀpŚus_8.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:162: tad u ha vai saptavidham eva cinvīta /
GV06apsulb_u:164: tata ūrdhvam ekottarān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_8.4 //
GV06apsulb_u:167: aṣṭavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ yad anyat saptabhyas tat saptadhā vibhajya pratipuruṣam āveśayet // ĀpŚus_8.6a //
GV06apsulb_u:171: yāvān yajamāna ūrdhvabāhus tāvad antarāle veṇoś chidre karoti madhye tṛtīyam // ĀpŚus_8.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:172: apareṇa yūpāvaṭadeśam anupṛṣṭhyaṃ veṇuṃ nidhāya chidreṣu śaṅkūn nihatyonmucyāparābhyāṃ dakṣiṇāprāk parilikhed āntāt // ĀpŚus_8.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:173: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya dakṣiṇā pratyakparilikhed āntāt // ĀpŚus_8.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:174_0: unmucya veṇuṃ madhyame śaṅkāv antyaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucyoparyupari lekhāsamaraṃ
GV06apsulb_u:174_1: dakṣiṇā veṇuṃ nidhāyāntye chidre śaṅkuṃ nihatya tasmin madhyamaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucya
GV06apsulb_u:174_2: lekhāntayor itare pratiṣṭhāpya chidrayoḥ śaṅkū nihanti // ĀpŚus_9.1a //
GV06apsulb_u:176: evaṃ puradakṣiṇaṃ catura ātmani puruṣānavamimīte // ĀpŚus_9.2a //
GV06apsulb_u:179: aratninā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇam ity uktam // ĀpŚus_9.2c //
GV06apsulb_u:180: pṛṣṭhyāto vā puruṣamātrasyākṣṇayā veṇuṃ nidhāya pūrvasminn itaram /
GV06apsulb_u:184: rajjvā vā vimāyottaravedinyāyena veṇunā vimimīte // ĀpŚus_9.4 //
GV06apsulb_u:185: sapakṣapuccheṣu vidhābhyāse 'pacaye ca vidhāsaptamakaraṇīṃ puruṣasthānīyāṃ kṛtvā viharet // ĀpŚus_9.5 //
GV06apsulb_u:188: puruṣasya pañcamo bhāga ekataḥ prādeśa ekataḥ tat tṛtīyam // ĀpŚus_9.6b //
GV06apsulb_u:191: ūrvdhvapramāṇamiṣṭakānāṃ jānoḥ jānoḥ pañcamena kārayet // ĀpŚus_9.7a //
GV06apsulb_u:193: yat pacyamānānāṃ pratihrasīta purīṣeṇa tat sampūrayed aniyataparimāṇatvāt purīṣasya // ĀpŚus_9.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:194: upadhāne 'dhyardhā daśa purastāt pratīcīr ātmany upadadhāti /
GV06apsulb_u:197: pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayās tāsām ardheṣṭakāmātrāṇi pakṣayor bhavanti // ĀpŚus_10.1b //
GV06apsulb_u:198: pañcapañca pucchapārśvayor dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_10.1c //
GV06apsulb_u:199: pucche prādeśam upadhāya sarvam agniṃ pañcamabhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet // ĀpŚus_10.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:201: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā daśa dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāti /
GV06apsulb_u:203: yathā prathame prastāre pakṣau tathā puccham /
GV06apsulb_u:204: yathā pucchaṃ tathā pakṣau viparītā apyaye // ĀpŚus_10.4b //
GV06apsulb_u:207: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_10.6b //
GV06apsulb_u:209: pañcabhiḥ purīṣair abhyūhatīti purīṣāntā citir arthāntaratvāt purīṣasya // ĀpŚus_10.7 //
GV06apsulb_u:210: jānudaghnīṃ sāhasraṃ cinvīta prathamaṃ cinvānaḥ // ĀpŚus_10.8a //
GV06apsulb_u:211: nābhidaghnīṃ dviṣāhasraṃ dvitīyam āsyadaghnīṃ triṣāhasraṃ tṛtīyam uttaram uttaraṃ jyāyāmsam // ĀpŚus_10.8b //
GV06apsulb_u:212: mahāntaṃ bṛhantam aparimitaṃ svargakāmaś cinvīteti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_10.8c //
GV06apsulb_u:214: triṣāhasra triprastārāś caturthaprabhṛtiṣv āhāreṣu nityam iṣṭakāparimāṇam // ĀpŚus_10.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:215: vijñāyate ca ḥna jyāyāṃsaṃ citvā kanīyāṃsaṃ cinvīteti' // ĀpŚus_10.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:218: pādamātrayo bhavanti aratnimātrayo bhavanty ūrvasthimātrayo bhavanty aṇūkamātrayo bhavantīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_11.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:225: sandhyoś ca tadvad ātmānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulāpetāḥ // ĀpŚus_11.5a //
GV06apsulb_u:226: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīciś ca // ĀpŚus_11.5b //
GV06apsulb_u:228: pucche prādeśamupadhāya sarvam agniṃ caturbhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet // ĀpŚus_11.7 //
GV06apsulb_u:230: aparasmin prastāre pucchāpyaye pañcamabhāgīyā viśayāḥ // ĀpŚus_11.9a //
GV06apsulb_u:231: tā ātmani caturdaśabhiḥ pādair yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_11.9b //
GV06apsulb_u:234: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_11.11b //
GV06apsulb_u:235: ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ karaṇīnāṃ dvādaśena trayodaśenetīṣṭakāḥ kārayet // ĀpŚus_12.1a //
GV06apsulb_u:236: pādeṣṭakāś ca vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_12.1b //
GV06apsulb_u:237: ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ prathamāhāreṇa dvitīyena tṛtīyeneti yo yujyeta /
GV06apsulb_u:240: praugacitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_12.4 //
GV06apsulb_u:241: yāvānagniḥ sāratniprādeśo dvistāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ caturaśrāṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāc chroṇīṃ pratyālikhet /
GV06apsulb_u:245: ubhayayaḥ praugaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta prajātān bhrātṛvyān nudeya pratijaniṣyamāṇān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_12.7 //
GV06apsulb_u:247: tāvad eva tīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya pūrvāparayoḥ karaṇyor ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet /
GV06apsulb_u:251: rathacakracitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_12.11 //
GV06apsulb_u:252: yāvān agniḥ sāratniprādeśas tāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ parimaṇḍalāṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvatsambhavet // ĀpŚus_12.12 //
GV06apsulb_u:254: tāsāṃ ṣaṭ pradhāv upadhāya śeṣam aṣṭadhā vibhajet // ĀpŚus_13.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:257: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_13.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:264: paścāt tsarur bhavaty anurūpatvāyeti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_13.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:265: sarvasyā bhūmer daśamaṃ tsarus tasya pucchena nirhāra uktaḥ // ĀpŚus_13.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:272: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāty uttarataś ca dakṣiṇās tsarupārśvayor dakṣiṇā utīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_13.15 //
GV06apsulb_u:276: samūhyaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:280: paricāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.4 //
GV06apsulb_u:283: upacāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.6 //
GV06apsulb_u:285: śmaśānacitaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayet pitṛloka ṛdhnuyāmiti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:286: dvayāni khalu śmamaśānāni caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca // ĀpŚus_14.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:292: chandaścitaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.13 //
GV06apsulb_u:295: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_15.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:299: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_15.2b //
GV06apsulb_u:302: tāsāṃ tisraḥ śira itarat pakṣayor vibhajet // ĀpŚus_15.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:307: ardhadaśamā aratnayo 'ṅgulayaś ca caturbhāgonāḥ pakṣāyāmaḥ // ĀpŚus_15.5 //
GV06apsulb_u:310: pakṣasyāparayoḥ koṭyor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena prācīnam āyacched evaṃ purastāt /
GV06apsulb_u:318: śirasy ardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇayor nipātayet // ĀpŚus_15.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:321: karaṇaṃ puruṣasya pañcamāyāmaṃ ṣaṣṭhavyāsaṃ kārayed yathāyoganataṃ tatprathamam // ĀpŚus_16.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:335: evamanyat / uttaraṃ tūttarasyāḥ koṭyālikhet tad aṣṭamam // ĀpŚus_16.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:337: upadhāne ṣaṣṭiḥṣaṣṭiḥ pakṣayoḥ prathamā udīcīrnir upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_16.11 //
GV06apsulb_u:338: pucchapārśvayor aṣṭāvaṣṭau ṣaṭhyayas tisro 'gre tata ekān tatas tisraḥ tata ekā // ĀpŚus_16.12 //
GV06apsulb_u:340: tayos tu paścāt pañcamyāv anīkasaṃhite // ĀpŚus_16.12 //
GV06apsulb_u:341: śeṣe daśa caturthyaḥ śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_17.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:342: śeṣe ca ṣaḍviṃśatir aṣṭau ṣaṣṭayaś catasraḥ pañcamyaḥ // ĀpŚus_17.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:347: apyayayoś ca tṛtīyā ātmānam aṣṭabhāgāvetāḥ // ĀpŚus_17.5a //
GV06apsulb_u:352: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau caturthyo dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_17.7a //
GV06apsulb_u:353: śeṣe ca viṃśatis triṃśat ṣaṣṭhayaḥ ekāṃ pañcamīm // ĀpŚus_17.7b //
GV06apsulb_u:354: śirasi caturthyau tayoś ca purastāccatasro navamyaḥ // ĀpŚus_17.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:356: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_17.10 //
GV06apsulb_u:357: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_18.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:361: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_18.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:362: puruṣasya ṣoḍaśabhir viṃśaṃ śataṃ sāratniprādeśaḥ saptavidhaḥ saṃpadyate /
GV06apsulb_u:363: tāsāṃ catvāriṃśadātmani tisraḥ śirasi pañcadaśa puccha ekatriṃśad dakṣiṇe pakṣe tathottare // ĀpŚus_18.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:364: adhyardhapuruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmata iti dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya śroṇyaṃsebhyo dve dve ṣoḍasyau nirasyet /
GV06apsulb_u:366: śirasyardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet // ĀpŚus_18.5a //
GV06apsulb_u:369: puruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmataḥ ṣoḍaśabhāgaś ca dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GV06apsulb_u:371: pakṣāgrepakṣāgre puruṣacaturthena catvāri caturaśrāṇi kṛtvā tāny akṣṇayā vyavalikhyārdhāni nirasyet /
GV06apsulb_u:373: pakṣāgram utsṛjya madhye pakṣasya prācīṃ lekhām ālikhet // ĀpŚus_18.8a //
GV06apsulb_u:374: pakṣāpyaye puruṣaṃ niyamya lekhāyāṃ puruṣānte nitodantukuryāt /
GV06apsulb_u:375: nitodāt prācīnaṃ puruṣānte nitodaṃ nitodayor nānāntāv ālikhet /
GV06apsulb_u:378: dvipuruṣaṃ pascādardhapuruṣaṃ purastāc caturbhāgonaḥ puruṣa āyāmo 'ṣṭādaśakaraṇyo pārśvayos tāḥ pañcadaśaparigṛhṇanti /
GV06apsulb_u:381: aṣṭamena tribhir aṣṭamaiś caturthena caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti // ĀpŚus_19.2b //
GV06apsulb_u:382: ardheṣṭakāṃ tribhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti // ĀpŚus_19.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:383: pādeṣṭakāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaviśeṣārdhābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.4 //
GV06apsulb_u:384: pakṣeṣṭakāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.5 //
GV06apsulb_u:385: pakṣamadhyīyāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.6 //
GV06apsulb_u:386: pakṣāgrīyāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaptamābhyām ekaṃ caturthasaviśeṣasaptamābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.7 //
GV06apsulb_u:394: apareṇaikādaśa pūrveṇa pucchāpyayaṃ pañcāpareṇa pañca pañcadaśa pucchāgre // ĀpŚus_19.9 //
GV06apsulb_u:395: catasraścatasraḥ pakṣāgrīyāḥ pakṣāgrayoḥ pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayāḥ // ĀpŚus_20.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:396: tā ātmani catasṛbhiś catasṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśībhir yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_20.2 //
GV06apsulb_u:401: aparasmin prastāre purastāc chirasi dve ṣoḍaśyau bāhyaviśeṣe upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_20.6a //
GV06apsulb_u:405: ātmanaḥ karaṇīnāṃ sandhiṣu ṣoḍaśyo bāhyaviśeṣā upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_20.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:411: yac caturaśraṃ tryaśraṃ vā saṃpadyetārdheṣṭakābhiḥ pādeṣṭakābhir vā pracchādayet // ĀpŚus_20.12 //
GV06apsulb_u:413: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_20.14 //
GV06apsulb_u:414: kaṅkacid alajacid iti śyenacitā vyākhyātau // ĀpŚus_21.1 //
GV06apsulb_u:415: evami va hi śyenasya varṣīyāṃsau pakṣau pucchād vakrau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ dīrgha ātmā maṇḍalaṃ śiraś ca /
GV06apsulb_u:418: jñāyate ca / kaṅkacitaṃ śīrṣaṇvantaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta saśīrṣo 'muṣmiṃl loke saṃbhaveyam iti vidyamāne kathaṃ brūyāt // ĀpŚus_21.3 //
GV06apsulb_u:419: prākṛtau vakrau pakṣau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ vikāraśravaṇāt // ĀpŚus_21.4a //
GV06apsulb_u:425: dīrghacaturaśrāṇāṃ samāsena pakṣapucchānāṃ samāsa uktaḥ // ĀpŚus_21.8 //
GV06apsulb_u:427: tatra puruṣābhyāso nāratniprādeśānāṃ saṅkhyāsaṃyogāt saṅkhyāsaṃyogāt // ĀpŚus_21.10 //
